subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] How to obtain a Frank's Box?
author: Nellie Kampmann
full_text:
On Thu, Feb 28, 2008 at 2:31 PM, Fransen, Debbie
<debbie.fransen@...> wrote:
> John,
> Frank does not make any boxes to sell. Have already asked, as have many
> people.
> The minibox does work though.

Shoot, even the Radio Shack hacks work well.  I know I've been getting
a lot of clear, sensible responses through mine.


Nellie
